title: Create Customized 3D Contour Plots
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create a triangular 3D filled contour plot using the Matplotlib library in Python. The plot will be created using unstructured triangular grids and customized triangulation. You will be able to control the view angle and color map of the plot.

meta.title: 3D Filled Contour Plot | Matplotlib Python Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to create a triangular 3D filled contour plot using Matplotlib in Python. Customize the view angle and color map for your visualization.
meta.keywords: 3D Contour Plot, Matplotlib, Python, Triangular Grid, Visualization
